name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bradley LONG, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bradley LONG, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of March, 1999, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is VACATED and this matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further consideration in light of this Court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Anders, — Pa. -, 725 A.2d 170 (1999).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bradley LONG, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 23, 1999.
